Trade/Device Name(s): Biophen Low Molecular Weight Heparin (LMWH) Control Plasma
Biophen Low Molecular Weight Heparin (LMWH) Control Low
Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose system for in vitro coagulation studies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Biophen LMWH and UFH control plasmas and calibrators for quality control and calibration of heparin measurements using chromogenic anti-Xa assays.
Indications for Use Summary: For quality control and calibration of Low Molecular Weight Heparin (LMWH) and Unfractionated Heparin (UFH) measurements in plasma using anti-Xa colorimetric assays.
